tool_description: Manages proxy server rotation to distribute requests across multiple IP addresses and avoid detection.

proxy_list.description: Array of proxy server addresses (IP:PORT format)

health_check.description: Whether to check proxy health before use

error_messages: Empty proxy list: Provide at least one proxy server address.
Invalid proxy format: Proxy addresses must be in IP:PORT format.
Invalid rotation strategy: Use one of [round_robin, random, weighted].
Health check failed: All proxies failed health check. Verify proxy list.
usage: Provide a list of proxy servers and configure rotation strategy. The tool will manage proxy selection and health monitoring.

healthy_proxies.description: Number of proxies that passed health check
